remarks: Lemma for ~ cnlnadji . ` F ` is an adjoint of ` T ` (later, we will show it is unique).  (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cnlnadjlem.1 $e |- T e. LinOp $.
cnlnadjlem.2 $e |- T e. ConOp $.
cnlnadjlem.3 $e |- G = ( g e. ~H |-> ( ( T ` g ) .ih y ) ) $.
cnlnadjlem.4 $e |- B = ( iota_ w e. ~H A. v e. ~H ( ( T ` v ) .ih y ) = ( v .ih w ) ) $.
cnlnadjlem.5 $e |- F = ( y e. ~H |-> B ) $.
cnlnadjlem5 $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( ( T ` C ) .ih A ) = ( C .ih ( F ` A ) ) ) $.
$d A g v w y $.
$d F w $.
$d G v w $.
$d T g v w y $.
